original_text: The king of Babylon has heard news about them, and he is very afraid. He feels too weak to fight. He feels pain like a woman who is giving birth. korean_text: 바벨론의 왕이 그 소문을 듣고 손이 약하여지며 고통에 사로잡혀 해산하는 여인처럼 진통하는도다

sentences.original_text: The king of Babylon has heard news about them
sentences.korean_translation: 바빌론 왕은 그들에 대한 소식을 들었다

sentences.original_text: and he is very afraid
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 매우 두려워한다

sentences.original_text: He feels too weak to fight
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 싸우기에 너무 약한 느낌이다

sentences.original_text: He feels pain like a woman who is giving birth
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 아이를 낳는 여자처럼 고통을 느낀다
